abstract: Bank of America is close to signing a deal to become the biggest sponsor of the new Yankee Stadium, in a pact that could fetch the stadium as much as $20 million a year, according to press reports.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is close to signing a deal to become the biggest sponsor of the new Yankee Stadium, in a pact that could fetch the stadium as much as $20 million a year, according to press reports.

headline.main: Bank of America Said to Be Near Deal as Sponsor of Yankee Stadium
